Reviews.Title: Customers service is a crap
Reviews.Author: hazem
Reviews.Content: Customers service is a crapI bought this laptop few months ago,and i think it was the worst decision that i had made in my life,the screen get cracked spontaneously, and Sony refused to repair it.they have the worst customer service.i am not gonna buy any Sony product again.

Reviews.Title: Very slow computer
Reviews.Author: Jeff Vinson
Reviews.Content: The wireless internet was extremely slow even when next to the router.  The workload of using basic programs such as Word or Excel had unusually long pauses for processing.  Would not recommend this computer!

Reviews.Title: Great laptop!!
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: I got this laptop for Work activities and since day 1 , i been very satisfied , fast processor , amazing features and internet connection is very fast . Totally recommended

Reviews.Title: Terrible. Just Terrible.
Reviews.Author: Bri
Reviews.Content: Got this for Christmas and was very excited about it. Had difficulty connecting to the internet, computer showed the router was bad even though our other laptop was connected to wifi just fine, as well as our phones and xbox. Every time I restarted the laptop I would have to reconnect to wifi. Finally wifi stopped working altogether and when it finally connected to my network it showed limited access. When I troubleshot the problem it showed nothing to be wrong. I will be returning this first chance I get for a laptop that will actually work. Very disappointed with this poor quality system. I will not be purchasing another Sony computer thanks to this fiasco. Don't waste your time or money.
